014package org.microbean.bean;
015
016import java.lang.constant.Constable;
017import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
018import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
019
020import java.lang.invoke.MethodHandles;
021import java.lang.invoke.VarHandle;
022
023import java.util.Collections;
024
025import java.util.function.BiConsumer;
026import java.util.function.BiFunction;
027import java.util.function.BinaryOperator;
028import java.util.function.Function;
029import java.util.function.Supplier;
030
031import java.util.ArrayList;
032import java.util.Collection;
033import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
034import java.util.List;
035import java.util.Map;
036import java.util.Map.Entry;
037import java.util.Objects;
038import java.util.Optional;
039import java.util.SequencedSet;
040import java.util.Set;
041
042import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
043import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap;
044
045import java.util.stream.Collector;
046import java.util.stream.Collector.Characteristics;
047
048import org.microbean.bean.Alternate.Resolver;
049
050import org.microbean.constant.Constables;
051
052import org.microbean.lang.TypeAndElementSource;
053
054import static java.lang.Integer.signum;
055
056import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
057import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Collection;
058import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Map;
059
060import static java.util.Collections.unmodifiableSequencedSet;
061
062import static java.util.function.Predicate.not;
063
064import static org.microbean.bean.ConstantDescs.CD_Assignability;
065import static org.microbean.bean.ConstantDescs.CD_DefaultBeanSet;
066import static org.microbean.bean.ConstantDescs.CD_Resolver;
067import static org.microbean.bean.Qualifiers.anyAndDefaultQualifiers;
068import static org.microbean.bean.Qualifiers.defaultQualifiers;
069import static org.microbean.bean.Ranked.DEFAULT_RANK;
070
071import static org.microbean.scope.Scope.SINGLETON_ID;
072
073// Experimenting with making this non-final so the no-arg constructor can supply its own beans via some other
074// mechanism. Think ldc.
075public class DefaultBeanSet implements BeanSet, Constable {
076
077
078  /*
079   * Static fields.
080   */
081
082
083  private static final VarHandle RESOLVER;
084
085  static {
086    try {
087      RESOLVER = MethodHandles.lookup().findVarHandle(DefaultBeanSet.class, "resolver", Resolver.class);
088    } catch (final IllegalAccessException | NoSuchFieldException e) {
089      throw (Error)new ExceptionInInitializerError(e.getMessage()).initCause(e);
090    }
091  }
092
093
094  /*
095   * Instance fields.
096   */
097
098
099  private volatile Resolver resolver;
100
101  private final Assignability assignability;
102
103  private final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> beans;
104
105  // A cache of Beans that were selected by a BeanSelectionCriteria
106  private final ConcurrentMap<BeanSelectionCriteria, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>> selectionCache;
107
108  // Guaranteed to be a submap of selectionCache.
109  private final ConcurrentMap<BeanSelectionCriteria, Bean<?>> resolutionCache;
110
111
112  /*
113   * Constructors.
114   */
115
116
117  public DefaultBeanSet(final Collection<? extends Bean<?>> beans) {
118    this(new Assignability(), beans, Map.of(), StockResolver.INSTANCE);
119  }
120
121  public DefaultBeanSet(final Assignability assignability, final Collection<? extends Bean<?>> beans) {
122    this(assignability, beans, Map.of(), StockResolver.INSTANCE);
123  }
124
125  @SuppressWarnings("this-escape")
126  public DefaultBeanSet(final Assignability assignability,
127                        final Collection<? extends Bean<?>> beans,
128                        final Map<? extends BeanSelectionCriteria, ? extends Bean<?>> preCalculatedResolutions,
129                        final Resolver resolver) {
130    super();
131    this.assignability = assignability == null ? new Assignability() : assignability;
132    this.resolver = resolver == null ? StockResolver.INSTANCE : resolver;
133    this.resolutionCache = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
134    this.selectionCache = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
135
136    final List<Bean<?>> newBeans = new ArrayList<>(beans.size() + 2 + preCalculatedResolutions.size());
137    newBeans.addAll(beans);
138    for (final Entry<? extends BeanSelectionCriteria, ? extends Bean<?>> e : preCalculatedResolutions.entrySet()) {
139      final BeanSelectionCriteria bsc = e.getKey();
140      final Bean<?> b = e.getValue();
141      if (!bsc.selects(b)) {
142        throw new IllegalArgumentException("preCalculatedResolutions; beanSelectionCriteria (" + bsc + ") does not select bean (" + b + ")");
143      }
144      newBeans.add(b);
145      this.resolutionCache.put(bsc, b);
146    }
147    newBeans.add(this.resolverBean());
148    newBeans.add(this.bean());
149    Collections.sort(newBeans, DefaultBeanSet::compareRanks);
150    // Second pass to efficiently prime the selection cache now that validation has happened.
151    for (final BeanSelectionCriteria bsc : preCalculatedResolutions.keySet()) {
152      this.beans(bsc, newBeans);
153    }
154    this.beans = unmodifiableSequencedSet(new LinkedHashSet<>(newBeans));
155
156    // Prime the selection and resolution caches with our beans.
157    final TypeAndElementSource tes = assignability.typeAndElementSource();
158    this.bean(new BeanSelectionCriteria(assignability, tes.declaredType(BeanSet.class), defaultQualifiers(), true), DefaultBeanSet::returnNull);
159    this.bean(new BeanSelectionCriteria(assignability, tes.declaredType(Resolver.class), defaultQualifiers(), true), DefaultBeanSet::returnNull);
160  }
161
162
163  /*
164   * Instance methods.
165   */
166
167
168  @Override // BeanSet
169  public final Bean<?> bean(final BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria) {
170    return this.bean(beanSelectionCriteria, Resolver::fail);
171  }
172
173  @Override // BeanSet
174  public final Bean<?> bean(final BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria,
175                            final BiFunction<? super BeanSelectionCriteria, ? super Collection<? extends Bean<?>>, ? extends Bean<?>> op) {
176    return this.resolutionCache.computeIfAbsent(beanSelectionCriteria, s -> this.resolver.resolve(s, this.beans(s), op)); // volatile read
177  }
178
179  @Override // BeanSet
180  public final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> beans() {
181    return this.beans;
182  }
183
184  @Override // BeanSet
185  public final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> beans(final BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria) {
186    return this.beans(beanSelectionCriteria, this.beans);
187  }
188
189  @Override // Constable
190  public Optional<DynamicConstantDesc<DefaultBeanSet>> describeConstable() {
191    return this.assignability.describeConstable()
192      .flatMap(aDesc -> Constables.describeConstable(this.beans)
193               .flatMap(beansDesc -> Constables.describeConstable(this.resolutionCache)
194                        .flatMap(pcrDesc -> Constables.describeConstable(this.resolver)
195                                 .map(resolverDesc -> DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE,
196                                                                             MethodHandleDesc.ofConstructor(CD_DefaultBeanSet,
197                                                                                                            CD_Assignability,
198                                                                                                            CD_Collection,
199                                                                                                            CD_Map,
200                                                                                                            CD_Resolver),
201                                                                             aDesc,
202                                                                             beansDesc,
203                                                                             pcrDesc,
204                                                                             resolverDesc)))));
205  }
206
207  public final Resolver resolver(final Resolver r) {
208    return (Resolver)RESOLVER.getAndSet(this, Objects.requireNonNullElse(r, StockResolver.INSTANCE));
209  }
210
211  /*
212   * Reporting- and snapshot-oriented methods.
213   */
214
215  public final Set<BeanSelectionCriteria> beanSelectionCriterias() {
216    return this.selectionCache.keySet();
217  }
218
219  public final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> resolvedBeans() {
220    return this.resolutionCache.values().stream().collect(new BeanCollector());
221  }
222
223  public final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> selectedBeans() {
224    return this.selectionCache.values().stream().flatMap(Set::stream).collect(new BeanCollector());
225  }
226
227  public final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> unselectedBeans() {
228    final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> selectedBeans = this.selectedBeans();
229    return this.beans().stream().filter(not(selectedBeans::contains)).collect(new BeanCollector());
230  }
231
232  /*
233   * Private methods.
234   */
235
236  private final Bean<DefaultBeanSet> bean() {
237    final TypeAndElementSource tes = this.assignability.typeAndElementSource();
238    return
239      new Bean<>(new Id(new BeanTypeList(List.of(tes.declaredType(DefaultBeanSet.class),
240                                                 tes.declaredType(BeanSet.class))),
241                        anyAndDefaultQualifiers(),
242                        SINGLETON_ID,
243                        DEFAULT_RANK - 100),
244                 new Singleton<>(this));
245  }
246
247  private final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> beans(final BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria,
248                                            final Collection<? extends Bean<?>> beans) {
249    return
250      this.selectionCache.computeIfAbsent(beanSelectionCriteria,
251                                          bsc -> beans.stream().filter(bsc::selects).collect(new BeanCollector()));
252  }
253
254  private final Bean<Resolver> resolverBean() {
255    final TypeAndElementSource tes = this.assignability.typeAndElementSource();
256    return
257      new Bean<>(new Id(new BeanTypeList(List.of(tes.declaredType(null, tes.typeElement(Resolver.class)))),
258                        anyAndDefaultQualifiers(),
259                        SINGLETON_ID,
260                        DEFAULT_RANK),
261                 new Singleton<>(this.resolver)); // volatile read
262  }
263
264
265  /*
266   * Static methods.
267   */
268
269
270  private static final int compareRanks(final Ranked b0, final Ranked b1) {
271    return signum(b0.rank() - b1.rank());
272  }
273
274  private static final Bean<?> returnNull(final BeanSelectionCriteria x, final Collection<? extends Bean<?>> xx) {
275    return null;
276  }
277
278
279  /*
280   * Inner and nested classes.
281   */
282
283
284  private static final class StockResolver implements Constable, Resolver {
285
286    private static final Resolver INSTANCE = new StockResolver();
287
288    private StockResolver() {
289      super();
290    }
291
292    @Override // Constable
293    public final Optional<DynamicConstantDesc<StockResolver>> describeConstable() {
294      return Optional.empty();
295    }
296
297  }
298
299  private static final class BeanCollector implements Collector<Bean<?>, LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>> {
300
301    private BeanCollector() {
302      super();
303    }
304
305    @Override // Collector<Bean<?>, LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>>
306    public final BiConsumer<LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, Bean<?>> accumulator() {
307      return LinkedHashSet::add;
308    }
309
310    @Override // Collector<Bean<?>, LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>>
311    public final Set<Characteristics> characteristics() {
312      return Set.of();
313    }
314
315    @Override // Collector<Bean<?>, LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>>
316    public final BinaryOperator<LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>> combiner() {
317      return BeanCollector::merge;
318    }
319
320    @Override // Collector<Bean<?>, LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>>
321    public final Function<LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>> finisher() {
322      return Collections::unmodifiableSequencedSet;
323    }
324
325    @Override // Collector<Bean<?>, LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>>
326    public final Supplier<LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>> supplier() {
327      return LinkedHashSet::new;
328    }
329
330    private static final <T, S extends Collection<T>> S merge(final S s0, final S s1) {
331      s0.addAll(s1);
332      return s0;
333    }
334
335
336  }
337
338}
